chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to a movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello, everyone.Welcome to English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee. 您好,歡迎收聽口說英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we're going to talk about clothes. 這個單元裡面,我們要來聊聊你喜歡穿的衣服。首先,就讓我們來聽一下這個單元的問題,以及示範回答。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Question.Describe a type of clothes you like and explain why you like it so much.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: I prefer jeans for several reasons.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Comfortable and confident.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: I particularly like jeans. 我特別喜歡牛仔褲。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: These clothes make me comfortable.They're also easy to mix and match, and I still can look young and stylish.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 很容易混搭的意思。Mix and match就是混搭。Stylish是一個形容詞,就是很有型的、時髦的。But of course, when going to any formal gathering or attending an invitation, I would try to pull on something formal. 不過當然,當要去正式的聚會或是參加邀約,我會穿點正式的服飾。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Go to a formal gathering 就是參加正式的聚會。Formal 是一個形容詞,就是正式的。Gathering 是一個名詞,叫做聚會。Attend an invitation 就是參加邀約。Attend 是一個動詞,就是參加。Invitation 是個名詞,是邀請。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Pull on something formal 就是穿點正式的。Pull on 是一個片語,表示是穿上。Pull on 是穿著的動作。如果是穿著的狀態,我們就會用wear,w-e-a-r 這個動詞。而formal 是一個形容詞,就是正式的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: In some occasions, you have to look smart.On some occasions 就是在某些場合。Occasion 是一個名詞,就是情境場合的意思。But I feel more confident with casual clothing.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: I prefer jeans for several reasons.First of all, I'm comfortable with jeans, but not the skinny kind.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Skinny 是一個形容詞,原來指的是很瘦的。用在服飾上就是合身的、緊身的。I do not prefer those.我真的不喜歡那種。Besides, jeans are ready-made at reasonable prices.此外,牛仔褲是價格合理的成衣。Ready-made 用在服裝上指的是成衣的意思。At reasonable prices.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 就是價格合理的。When I put on jeans with a polo shirt,I feel comfortable and confident.當我穿上牛仔褲配上polo衫的時候,我覺得舒服又有自信。Language focus 學習焦點When going 當去到
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Bring your tests when going to the doctor.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 記得帶著你的檢驗報告。You bring your tests when you go to the doctor.What travel documents do I need when going abroad?當出國旅遊的時候,我需要帶什麼旅遊文件呢?When going downstairs, I'm having a knee pain.當下樓的時候,我膝蓋會痛。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Casual 形容詞,休閒的、隨意的。Wardrobe 名詞,衣櫥、衣櫃。Particularly 副詞,特別是、尤其是。Stylish 形容詞,時髦的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Gathering 名詞,聚會、集會。Attend 動詞,出席、參加、到場。Invitation 名詞,邀請、邀請函。Occasion 名詞,時刻、時候。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: Invident 形容詞,自信的、有信心的。The type of clothes you like.希望您都學會囉。OK, that's all for this unit.最後請記得,每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通。我是啟稟老師,until then, see you next time.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 口說英語通Describe a type of clothes you like. 自己的穿搭風格要怎麼介紹才吸引人呢聽聽齊斌老師怎麼說.json

chunks.chunk_text: 字幕由啟稟老師製作主持
